import React, { Component } from 'react' import _ from 'lodash' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import connectComponent from '@/connect' import WrapComponents from '@/components/wrapper' import { Radio } from '@/components/radio' import { ColoredButtons, TransparentButtons } from '@/components/button' import Stepper from '@/components/stepper' import Loader from '@/components/loader' import { LoaderFlash } from '@/components/loader' import './index.scss' import IosBg from '../../assets/images/ios-bg.jpg' import WebBg from '../../assets/images/web-bg.jpg' import { getParentDetails } from '@/actions/CreateCampaign/PnCampaign' import { SendCampaign } from '@/actions/utils' class StepFive extends Component { state = { parentID: '', steps: ['Channel', 'Message', 'Scheduling', 'Segmentation', 'Overview'], sent: false, } async componentWillMount() { const { parentID } = this.state let { params: { parent_id }, } = this.props.match parent_id = parseInt(parent_id, 10) this.setState({ parentID: parent_id, }) if (!this.props.CreateCampaign.data && parentID) { const res = await getParentDetails(parentID) console.log(res, 'response in 5t pn') this.setState({ senderEmailId: _.get(res, 'senderEmailId', ''), replyToEmailId: _.get(res, 'replyToEmailId', ''), title: _.get(res, 'title', ''), name: _.get(res, 'name', ''), senderName: _.get(res, 'senderName', ''), scheduledTime: _.get(res, 'scheduledTime', ''), }) console.log(res) } } handleInputFields(key, value) { if (!value) { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } else { this.setState({ [key]: value, }) } } sendCampaign = async () => { const { data } = this.props.CreateCampaign // const { campaignId, parentID } = this.state // const response = await SendCampaign({ campaignId: parseInt(campaignId, 10) }) const requests = [] if (_.isArray(data)) { _.forEach(data, part => { requests.push(SendCampaign({ campaignId: part.campaignId || part.campaignId })) }) } await Promise.all(requests) this.setState({ sent: true, }) } render() { const { steps, parentID, sent } = this.state const { CreateCampaign } = this.props if (CreateCampaign.loading) { return } return (
